title: How will our Dynamic Q MMR (current MMR) affect our next season's Solo Q MMR?
body:
Will there be an MMR reset for the new re-introduced solo Q in 2017?

Or will our current Dynamic Q MMR affect it?

Cheers

replies.body:
It will probably be the regular reset, so harsh, but not all that harsh.

Which means anyone that abused Dynamic Queue this season get away with the ranks for free (though anyone that see's their ranked history will probably call them out on it)

Gotta add that * to all Season 6 Ranks for Dynamic Queue.
